I struggled with this one too until... the Baldur doesn't move if you're near them. Stand near one and spam shoot the other one.

One thing I noticed is the lack of reviews. No major gaming press site has released a review as of yet.
One factor might be that the game is hard, huge and doesn't tell you where to go so it's taking a while.

WRITING.TITLE: Lack of Hollow Knight coverage
WRITING.TEXT:
TL;DR - souls-like metroidvania gets released at an unfortunate time
So as a few of you might know Hollow Knight has been released at a really unfortunate time, right along Horizon Zero Dawn, the Switch and Breath of the Wild.
I think it's a shame cause the game is phenomenal.
Here's the release trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UAO2urG23S4
I think it's a shame the game is getting so little coverage so I wanted to try and start a discussion on what the devs could've done or do to promote the game more. Different release date would be my suggestion.
What do you think and also what do you think of the game?

https://scontent-frt3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t35.0-12/17091275_10211828290041135_44342381_o.png?oh=08bdac950622142563780cd707817fc0 oe=58B7AC08
Found a clipping issue in the mines, was doing platforming when suddenly I'm part of the platform.
Thank you for this write-up.
I'd give you could only for mentioning Styx.

Don't know how many review copies the developer sent out and when. This is an incredibly large, slow-paced (when it comes to upgrades) and difficult game.
Think it's gonna take some time for anyone to do a complete run.
The game is fantastic but if you push past an hour without breaks it can get pretty tiresome.
I didn't see what sub it was or the nsfw tag an expected dolphins. I'm actually kinda disappointed.

WRITING.TITLE: [NeedAdvice] What makes for an effective week review?
WRITING.TEXT:
I've been tracking my daily activities for more than a week now and I wanted to do a week review on my day off.
I don't know what to look for in my notes or what to grade. Should it be something that's easy to measure or should it entail preparations for what to do in the future.
Any advice is welcome.

Jeste :D
Svjestan sam da ih zesce shillam, ali to zato jer stvarno vjerujem da su dobri.

Problem s tim je sto Louis radi skoro 30 godina, ne samo standup vec radio, televizija, filmovi i podcasting. Covjek svo to iskustvo kombinira u svoj nastup.
Kod nas najbolji imaju jedva 10 godina iskustva i to samo stand-up. Ako smanjis ocekivanja mogu uvijek preporucit Lajnap ekipu.
Dosta se eksperimentira, posebno na ope micovima no onda riskiras da dodes na neciji materijal koji prvi put izvodi i potpuno potone fora.
Jako mi je drago da si se lijepo provela, nadam se da me jednog dana vidis na stageu i isto se tako iznenadis :)

Sto se tice ukusa je jeben, ali najveca razlika od njih i nase ekipe je iksustvo. Louis je vec u svojim 20ima pisao za Conan dok je Bill Burr krenuo s 18 (ovo nisam sigguran 100%). Louis je 49, a Bill 48. Obojica imaju skoro 30 godina staza s tim da rade u televiziji, radiju i filmovima. Obojica imaju svoje serije.
Nas najstariji komicar je Pedja, ali on ima jedva 10 godina staza. Lajnap ekipa isto tako.
Zato sam jako optimistican sto se tice moguceg rasta scene u HR. Sto vise iskustva to bolje.
1. i 3. ala mogu biti slucajnost jer su teme toliko ceste, ali ovo s reditta je vec jaci dokaz.
Traceva nema. Ona zeli monopol stand-upa u Hrvatskoj i ako nije po njenom baca hissy fit.

Sto se tice novog materijala moj savjet je, ako se ide gledati istog izvodaca, pogledati predstavu svaka 3 mjeseca.
Iz vlastitog iskustva znam koliko je tesko napisati materijal koji je spreman za scenu. Ako napisem A4 stranicu potpuno ispisanu od vrha do vrha sretan sam ako mogu jednu recenicu od toga ponjeti na pozornicu.
I onda ju jos moram dobro izvesti inace propada.
Ovo me podsjeca na trenutak kad sam nasao vlastiti strip na r/comedycemetery

Preporucio bih Lajnap ekipu koja vise puta tjedno rade predstave u Zagrebu u Kino Gri.
Prvo sam online gledao tampara prije nego sto sam ga vidio uzivo i bio mi je okay. Uzivo me dva puta doveo do suza.
Svida mi se ovakva perspektiva. Kod nas je scena mala i ima puno mjesta za rast.

koliko vidim ovo je zasad konsenzus:
a) nitko ne voli Marinu Orsag
b) ak si gledao preko interneta cini se dosta cringe
c) uzivo je dobro ili okay
Volio bih raditi na razvoju i rastu stand-up scene generalno u Hrvatskoj, a vec ima dosta ljudi koji se time bave i ide im. Dobri primjeri su Lajnap ekipa (tampar, Goc, Aleks, Koza) i Pedja Bajovi.
Ima puno mjesta za rast, tak da bi volio vidjeti misljenja opet za nekih 2-3 godine. Primjerice mi nemamo nikakve booking agencije niti promotere. Zasad sav taj posao ovisi o komicaru. Industrija zasad nije toliko jaka (cast iznimkama).
Preporucio bih tampara i cijelu Lajnap ekipu ako ikad imas vremena ih pogledati.
Hvala, procitam navecer :)
Jel Joa?
Nepismenost najcesce.
Preporucio bi Lajnap ekipu koja redovito ima nastupe u Zagrebu u Kinu Gri ako bi bila voljna dati jos jednu sansu.

Ste ikad gledali?
Bi voljeli pogledati?
Znate li ikog tko se bavi time?

Can a setup be funny? Yes
Does it have to be? No
Can the setup be long? In most cases it shouldn't

WRITING.TEXT:
The game is fantastic. The gameplay has allot of difficulty spikes early on but I found the game rather fun.
The story, characters and especially music are something else. The ending is a depressing gut-punch and I love it. I love the story so so much.
If you like having your soul ripped out of your chest then cry for a solid 10 minutes then yes. I love this game so much.
Lisa the Painful. Game is fun but has ridiculous difficulty jumps. The story is a fucking 10/10 tho.

This is a soul crushing emotional game.
It's the only game to make me cry. I had to take a good 30 min break after beating it.
It starts out brutal, makes you laugh along the way then leaves you a broken man.
Two actually, necromancer from the first comic as well.
WHAT
It really is. Weird part is the conversation goes much better if you start with shitposting
If this doesn't get a million views by the end of a year than I have truly misjudged people.

WRITING.TITLE: My friend played a round as Centaur on his smurf account
WRITING.TEXT: It was a stomp.

My fucking time to shine! Imam depresiju i generalni aknsiozni poremeaj. Javio sam im se dok sam bio u ZG i uputili su me u dobrom smjeru.
Veinu posla e morati sam/sama raditi to se tie terapije. Dobit e par savjeta. Neki dobri, a neki malo manje korisni. Oni sami priznaju da ne rade dovoljno dugo sa studentima jer imaju mal budget, ali voljni su pomoi i sasluati te uputiti nekom profesionalcu ako ti treba konkretna pomo (psihijatar).
CBT je super pod uvjetom da ju prakticira. Moe se puno obrazovati o tome online. Najbolje je raditi s psihologom i rei mu to planira samostalno raditi.
Ako ode doktrou i preporui ti anksiolitike rae nemoj jer za razliku od antidepresiva mogu izazvati ovisnost.
Preporuio bi meditiranje, djeluje sporo, ali mi je uvjerljivo najvie pomoglo sa anksioznosti. Drugo najbolje je tranje, a onda bilo kakav drugi sport. Osobno preferiram teretanu.
Ak ima vie pitanja sam javi. Tu sam 24/7
Would you let her fuck you for protection?

WRITING.TEXT: I like you attitude and thanks!

I recalibrated using the Compendium ranking from 2.6k to 3k. From that point I got to about 3.15k while the compendium lasted. I didn't know you had to play 40 games for the calibration to stay.
I was very sad but said to myself if I managed to get to 3k once I can do it again. After a few games in 2.6k I'm now 2.5k and falling. Your MMR gain is your team whether you like it or not.

WRITING.TITLE: Any suggestions on how to overcome fear of doing math/general practice problems?
WRITING.TEXT:
I really want to do good in college and am willing to commit. It's just that I feel like every time I try to do a math problem by myself, or any other subject, I can barely start the task or even understand what I have to do. I started developing an aversion to practice problems and I know that can't be healthy.
Anyone got any advice or do I just brute force it till I get better at it?
It's always winter with cold showers
I like your attitude, mister.

I met the dude at DotAPit in Split this year and it saddens me to see him getting all this shit thrown at him.
He may not be the best DotA personality but he was very nice to us and other people at the event.
Dude seemed super sincere.
Wonder if there will be any new mega evolutions. Alola forms are so cool, great way to reintroduce old pokemon while still keeping it fresh.
We had several pauses. We pushed it just above the 2 hour mark with picking phase included.
I feel honored

WRITING.TITLE: Hypothetical question - Ogre Magi core/carry (pubs only)
WRITING.TEXT:
TL;DR - I want to play Ogre Magi core but at the same time I don't want to be completely useless and ruin my team's fun
I think it would be fun to run Ogre Magi as a core/carry in pub games. Obviously there are better carries to chose from but this seems like something fun I would like to try out.
We're talking low pubs, something between 3.3 - 3.8k MMR.
The idea is to run him offlane with a support and let the offlaner have solo safelane (say Timber or Bristle). Think Venge would be a really good combo with the attack damage aura to combine with his tankiness early game. I'm wondering what the best support (specifically to make Ogre lane easier) would be.
Item build is still a question. Was thinking of trying to Vanguard first and after that to chose between Desolator, Battlefury, S Y and then maybe a Basher.
Itemisation is my biggest problem. I have no idea what to take early, mid and especially late game.
Maybe there's something really depressing about doing comics?

Really liked most of it, some parts I really couldn't understand and I tried. Sound quality is all over the place.
Aging like a president and 'fuck my dad' had me laughing alot. Seemed to me like you really got confident on stage round the 3 min mark, my suggestion would be to try to open like that already - you obviously have the material for it so you can feel good about starting strong.
Hope that helps.

Only until we get better.
I went too much into it with my comics, will change up the themes.

Ha! It was 4 comics all along!
http://i.imgur.com/Zjpj3lY.jpg
Maybe try record yourself during the competition and cut out the weaker parts for the next round and try something new?

In the Pixar book they discuss how they had to train employees to not take criticism of an idea personally during idea pitch meetings.
They had to take extra time to educate everyone and I think it took like a year to show results.
Point being, even though you might criticize something a person said, rather than criticizing the person themselves, it takes a lot of effort for someone to realize it wasn't personal.
A demi-mod!

That's what someone who doesn't seek out negative comments would do. Think TB should opt out off being a mod, stay in contact with the mod team, get a special flair and make Genna a mod. Just my opinion.

Hello everyone, don't know how many will see this.
So it seems as people like these comics. Even the last ones: http://i.imgur.com/Jdy9qZr.jpg
And this one: http://i.imgur.com/Kq7jrVy.jpg
I'll probably do more in the future. Currently I don't have any site where I upload these other than imgur, I'm not familiar with running a site or using one to host comics.
I won't be uploading regularly but I'll be publishing few short comics in a batch and link them here.
The thing is I have no idea how the inform people that liked the old ones that there's a new update (for now).
Wanted to say thank you to all the kind words because it made me excited to do more.
Cheers!
